== Installation
=== EclipseLink
Download the "EclipseLink Installer Zip" implementation from the http://www.eclipse.org/eclipselink/downloads/"> EclipseLink Download Site .
The download contains several jars. We need the following jars:
eclipselink.jar
javax.persistence_*.jar
=== Derby Database
The example later will be using http://www.vogella.com/tutorials/ApacheDerby/article.html">Apache Derby as a database. Download Derby from http://db.apache.org/derby/"> http://db.apache.org/derby/ From this tutorial we will need the "derby.jar". For details on Derby (which is not required for this tutorial) please see http://www.vogella.com/tutorials/ApacheDerby/article.html">Apache Derby .
